node.name: Groovy-Eclipse for Indigo
node.shortdescription:
Groovy-Eclipse is the Eclipse-based tooling for the Groovy programming language. Groovy-Eclipse provides full IDE support for Groovy including editing support, content assist, search, refactoring, and maven integration.

Groovy-Eclipse does not provide any direct support for Grails. If you want Grails tooling, then please consider downloading the SpringSource Tool Suite (free, commercial license) that provides first-class support for your Grails projects.
node.body:
Groovy-Eclipse is the Eclipse-based tooling for the Groovy programming language. Groovy-Eclipse provides full IDE support for Groovy including editing support, content assist, search, refactoring, and maven integration.

Groovy-Eclipse does not provide any direct support for Grails. If you want Grails tooling, then please consider downloading the SpringSource Tool Suite (free, commercial license) that provides first-class support for your Grails projects.
